protocol_name: Genotyping protocol for detection of polymorhisms at codons 146 (N/S/D), 211 (R/Q) and 222 (Q/K) in the caprine PRNP gene
protocol_name_html: Genotyping protocol for detection of polymorhisms at codons 146 (N/S/D), 211 (R/Q) and 222 (Q/K) in the caprine PRNP gene
description: This Real-Time PCR genotyping protocol can be used for the detection of polymorphisms at codons 146 (N/S/D), 211 (R/Q) and 222 (Q/K) in the caprine PRNP gene. We developed four seperate Real-Time PCR reactions with four different Custom TaqMan® SNP Genotyping Assays (Applied Biosystems, Foster City, California, USA). Each SNP Genotyping Assay consisted of a mix of sequence-specific forward and reverse primers to amplify the polymorphic sequence of interest and two TaqMan® MGB probes, FAM and VIC dye-labeled to detect the amplified product.
before_start: Always ensure that the Genotyping Assays (primers and probes) have been fully thawed and mixed before use.

materials.reagent_name: KAPA PROBE FAST qPCR Master Mix (2X) Universal

materials.reagent_linfor: Forward primer: GCCATGAGCAGGCCTCTTATA Reverse primer: GGGTAACGGTACATGTTTTCACGAT  FAM probe: TTTTGGCAGTGACTATG VIC probe: CATTTTG
materials.reagent_name: Custom Taqman SNP Genotyping Assay (40X) (Assay ID: AHMSYKA - codon 146 (N/S))
materials.reagent_vendor_name: Applied Biosystems, Foster City, California, USA

materials.reagent_linfor: Forward primer: GAACTTCACCGAAACTGACATCAAG Reverse primer: ACTGGGTGATGCACATTTGCT FAM probe: AATGGAGCAAGTGGTG VIC probe: ATAATGGAG
materials.reagent_name: Custom Taqman SNP Genotyping Assay (40X) (Assay ID: AH89YZI - codon 211 (R/Q))
materials.reagent_vendor_name: Applied Biosystems, Foster City, California, USA

materials.reagent_linfor: Forward primer: TGGTGGAGCAAATGTGCATCA Reverse primer: GGGAAGAAAAGAGGATCACACTTG FAM probe: CTGGGATTCTCTCTTGTACTG VIC probe: TGGGA
materials.reagent_name: Custom Taqman SNP Genotyping Assay (40X) (Assay ID: AHABD5B - codon 222 (Q/K))
materials.reagent_vendor_name: Applied Biosystems, Foster City, California, USA

materials.reagent_linfor: Forward primer: GCCATGAGCAGGCCTCTT Reverse primer: GGGTAACGGTACATGTTTTCACGAT FAM probe: CATTTTGGCAATGACT VIC probe: ATACATTTTGGC
materials.reagent_name: Custom Taqman SNP Genotyping Assay (40X) (Assay ID: AHN1WQI - codon 146 (N/D))
materials.reagent_vendor_name: Applied Biosystems, Foster City, California, USA

warning:
• Wear appropriate personal protective equipment when handling reagents (gloves, protective clothing)
  • Minimize inhalation of reagents
  • Use only with adequate ventilation (fume hood)
protocol_affiliation: Veterinary Research Institute of Thessaloniki, Hellenic Agricultural Organization Demeter, Thessaloniki, Greece
manuscript_citation: Vouraki S, Gelasakis AI, Alexandri P, Boukouvala E, Ekateriniadou LV, Banos G, Arsenos G (2018) Genetic profile of scrapie codons 146, 211 and 222 in the PRNP gene locus in three breeds of dairy goats. PLoS ONE 13(6): e0198819. doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0198819
keywords: Real-Time PCR, Custom Taqman SNP Genotyping Assays, PRNP gene, goats

authors_list.name: Loukia Ekateriniadou
authors_list.affiliation: Veterinary Research Institute of Thessaloniki, Hellenic Agricultural Organization Demeter, Thessaloniki, Greece

authors_list.name: Evridiki Boukouvala
authors_list.affiliation: Veterinary Research Institute of Thessaloniki, Hellenic Agricultural Organization Demeter, Thessaloniki, Greece

guidelines:
• Genotyping Assays (primers and probes) should be stored protected from light and at -20 oC when not in use. Do not perform more than 10 freeze-thaw cycles.
  • KAPA PROBE FAST qPCR Master Mix should be stored at -20 oC when not in use. Do not perform more than 30 freeze-thaw cycles.
  • Avoid repeated freezing and thawing of all reagents.

components.data: Real-Time PCR Reactions (12.5 μl mixtures - Separate reactions for each Genotyping Assay)
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Real-Time PCR Reactions (12.5 μl mixtures - Separate reactions for each Genotyping Assay)

components.data:
KAPA PROBE FAST qPCR Master Mix (2X): 6.25μl

SNP Genotyping Assay Mix (primers and probes) (40X): 0.3125μl

Genomic DNA: 1μl (50-80ng)

H2O: 4.9375μl
